column2: Welcome to Meta Math Quiz.  This quiz will help you in your journey to learn how to do basic mathematical operations such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, raising to an exponent, taking a natural logarithm, taking a derivative, taking your sanity, taking an integral, and taking a square-root.  Fully simplify each of your answers, otherwise I will not accept your answers.  This course will be divided into three sections: Basic Math, Slightly Less Basic Math, and Basic Math for an Intelligent Computer Program.  Your results will be recorded.  Do NOT tamper with them.
In the equation x^2 = 9, what is x equal to?
In the equation ln(x) = e^2, what is x equal to?
Final question: What is the integral of the derivative of 2x+sqrt(31x^100)?

Wow.  It is hard for me to compute that you answered all questions correctly.  It's like you've taken this quiz before.  Well, anyway, I don't hand out rewards, so you'll have to just take whatever pride you can in the fact that you completed an easy Math Quiz.  You pass.

Your performance throughout this quiz has been sub-par at best and downright awful at worst.  Thank you for reaching the end, finally, so we can end this misery.  You fail.  Final grade.  Your welcome.  Go find something to suck on.
Would you like me to turn on Mentally-Disabled mode (Y/N)?  It might suit your quiz-taking experience better.
Would you like me to turn on Mentally-Disabled mode (Y/N)?  It might suit your quiz-taking experience better.

Thank you for your valuable input.  The rate and quality of your answers seem to indicate that the size of your brain is more like that of a goldfish.  This will help me in determining these set of problems tailored for your intellect.  Oops.  I forgot.  I'm talking to a troglodyte.  Let me alter my speech settings....  Hold on....  Almost finished....
Take 2 rocks.  How many rocks you have?
Take 1 rock.  Take another rock.  How many rocks you have?
Take 2 rocks.  Throw one rock.  How many rocks you have?
An error occurred while taking this math quiz.  I have a feeling you were behind it.  Anyway, I'm going to leave now.  Goodbye.
